<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"Kill an invocation"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"patch"}
  path={"/invocations/{invocation_id}/kill"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Kill the given invocation. This does not guarantee consistency for virtual object instance state, in-flight invocations to other services, etc.

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={[{"name":"invocation_id","in":"path","description":"Invocation identifier.","required":true,"schema":{"type":"string"}}]}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={undefined}
>
  
</RequestSchema>
